title: First Friday: Winter Vibes
description: Monthly campus-wide party with live music, food trucks, and good vibes! This month's theme is winter wonderland.

title: Lions Basketball vs. Gonzaga
description: Come support our Lions as they take on the Bulldogs! Game night energy always hits different at Gersten Pavilion.

title: Study Abroad Info Session
description: Learn about LMU's study abroad programs - Barcelona, Rome, Beijing, and more! Pizza will be provided.

title: Career Fair: Tech & Innovation
description: Network with top tech companies recruiting LMU students. Dress professionally and bring resumes!

title: Late Night Breakfast
description: Free pancakes, bacon, and good times during finals prep week. Because who doesn't love breakfast at 10 PM?

title: Film Screening: Student Showcase
description: Watch amazing films created by your fellow Lions! Our Film School students never disappoint.
